metadata.title: CVE-2022-39835 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Gajim through 1.4.7. The vulnerability allowsattackers, via crafted XML stanzas, to correct messages that were not sentby them. The attacker needs to be part of the group chat or single chat.The fixed version is 1.5.0.

criterions.comment: gajim package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
